text: The American Embassy School is an international school in New Delhi, India. The campus is twelve acres large, and it contains 34 faculty families on campus. The school, despite its large area, is being expanded to include additional students. The school accepts students from nursery to twelfth grade. All lessons, except for special language classes, are taught in English. There are about 1,500 students in the school, and although 35% of them are Americans, the rest of the students come from 53 different nationalities. The school's motto is "Enter to learn... Leave to serve." == Curriculum == The curriculum at AES follows the college preparatory program that are used in American private schools. At high school, students have the opportunity to take the program of either International Baccalaureate or Advanced Placement as well as a regular high school program. == Other websites == *The school homepage Category:Schools in India Category:New Delhi
